name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到 URL 的表单，则非常有用

landscape.desc: Display the component in landscape mode

mask.desc: Mask (formatting string) used for parsing and formatting value
mask.desc_cn: 用于解析和格式化值的掩码（格式化字符串）

days.desc: List of full day names (DDDD), starting with Sunday
days.desc_cn: 日期名称列表（DDDD），从星期天开始

daysShort.desc: List of short day names (DDD), starting with Sunday
daysShort.desc_cn: 日期简称列表（DDD），从星期天开始

months.desc: List of full month names (MMMM), starting with January
months.desc_cn: 月份全称列表（mm），从一月开始

monthsShort.desc: List of short month names (MMM), starting with January
monthsShort.desc_cn: 月份简称列表（MMM），从一月开始

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要的话）。来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared
square.desc_cn: 删除边框圆角（border-radius），使边框为正方形

flat.desc_cn: 应用 'flat' 设计（无默认阴影）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

model-value.desc: Date(s) of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
examples: v-model="[myDate1, { from: myDateFrom, to: myDateTo }, myDate2]"
model-value.desc_cn: 组件的时间，如果使用了 'multiple' 则必须是一个数组。可使用此属性（搭配一个 'update:model-value' 监听事件）或者直接使用 v-model 指令。

title.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header title; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode
title.desc_cn: 指定时，它将覆盖默认的头部标题；不处于“最小”模式时有意义

subtitle.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header subtitle; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode
subtitle.desc_cn: 当指定时，它会覆盖默认的头部副标题；不处于“最小”模式时有意义

default-year-month.desc: The default year and month to display (in YYYY/MM format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null); Please ensure it is within the navigation min/max year-month (if using them)
default-year-month.desc_cn: 模型未设置（undefined或null）时要显示的默认年份和月份（YYYY/MM格式）；请确保在年月的最小/最大导航内（如果使用）

default-view.desc: The view which will be displayed by default
default-view.desc_cn: 默认情况下显示的视图

years-in-month-view.desc: Show the years selector in months view
years-in-month-view.desc_cn: 在月视图中显示年选择器

events.desc: A list of events to highlight on the calendar; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (matches or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

returns.desc: If true, the current date will be highlighted

events.desc_cn: 日历上要突出显示的事件列表；如果使用函数，它将以字符串形式接收日期，并且必须返回布尔值（匹配与否）；如果使用函数，那么为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不要内联定义它

event-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette); If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a String (color for the received date); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
event-color.desc_cn: 颜色名称（来自Quasar调色板）；如果使用函数，它将接收作为字符串的日期，并且必须返回字符串（颜色表示接收的日期）；如果使用函数，那么为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不要内联定义它

options.desc: Optionally configure the days that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (is date acceptable or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline; Incompatible with 'range' prop

returns.desc: If true, the current date will be made available for selection

options.desc_cn: 可选择地配置能够选择的天数；如果使用函数，它将以字符串形式接收日期，并且必须返回布尔值（日期是否可接受）；如果使用一个函数，那么为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，不要内联定义它；与“range”属性不兼容

navigation-min-year-month.desc: Lock user from navigating below a specific year+month (in YYYY/MM format); This prop is not used to correct the model; You might want to also use 'default-year-month' prop
navigation-min-year-month.desc_cn: 锁定用户在特定年+月（YYYY/MM格式）以下导航；此属性不用于修正模型；您可能还需要使用“default-year-month”属性

navigation-max-year-month.desc: Lock user from navigating above a specific year+month (in YYYY/MM format); This prop is not used to correct the model; You might want to also use 'default-year-month' prop
navigation-max-year-month.desc_cn: 锁定用户在特定年+月（YYYY/MM格式）以上导航；此属性不用于修正模型；您可能还需要使用“default-year-month”属性

no-unset.desc: Remove ability to unselect a date; It does not apply to selecting a range over already selected dates
no-unset.desc_cn: 取消不选择日期的功能；它不适用于选择已选定日期的范围

first-day-of-week.desc: Sets the day of the week that is considered the first day (0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, ...); This day will show in the left-most column of the calendar
first-day-of-week.desc_cn: 设置一个星期的哪天被视为第一天（0-星期日，1-星期一，…）；这一天将显示在日历最左边的一栏中

today-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current day
today-btn.desc_cn: 显示选择当前日期的按钮

multiple.desc: Allow multiple selection; Model must be Array
multiple.desc_cn: 允许多选；模型必须是数组

range.desc: Allow range selection; Partial compatibility with 'options' prop: selected ranges might also include 'unselectable' days
range.desc_cn: 允许范围选择；与“options”属性部分兼容：选定的范围可能还包括“不能选择”的天

emit-immediately.desc: Emit model when user browses month and year too; ONLY for single selection (non-multiple, non-range)
emit-immediately.desc_cn: 用户浏览月份和年份时也会发出模型；仅用于单选（非多个，非范围）

default.desc: This is where additional buttons can go
default.desc_cn: 这是额外的按钮放置的位置

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

reason.desc: Reason of the user interaction (what was picked)

details.desc: Object of properties on the new model

year.desc: The year of the date that the user has clicked/tapped on

month.desc: The month of the date that the user has clicked/tapped on

day.desc: The day of the month that the user has clicked/tapped on

from.desc: Object of properties of the range starting point (only if range)

to.desc: Object of properties of the range ending point (only if range)

update:model-value.desc_cn: 当组件需要改变模型数据（model）时触发，也会被 v-model 使用

navigation.desc: Emitted when user navigates to a different month or year (and even when the model changes from an outside source)

view.desc: Definition of the current view (year, month)

navigation.desc_cn: 当用户导航到不同的月份或年份时发出（甚至当模型从外部源更改时）

range-start.desc: User has started a range selection

from.desc: Definition of date from where the range begins

range-end.desc: User has ended a range selection

from.desc: Definition of date from where the range begins

to.desc: Definition of date to where the range ends

offsetCalendar.desc: Increment or decrement calendar view's month or year
offsetCalendar.desc_cn: 递增或递减日历视图的月份或年份

setCalendarTo.desc: Change current year and month of the Calendar view; It gets corrected if using navigation-min/max-year-month and sets the current view to Calendar
setCalendarTo.desc_cn: 更改日历视图的当前年份和月份；如果使用navigation-min/max-year-month并将当前视图设置为Calendar，则会得到更正

from.desc: Definition of date from where the range begins

to.desc: Definition of date to where the range ends
